author: RTÉ News
title: China pauses in memory of virus victims and 'martyrs'
description: China came to a standstill today to mourn patients and medical staff killed by the coronavirus, as the world's most populous country observed a nationwide three-minute silence.
content:
China came to a standstill today to mourn patients and medical staff killed by the coronavirus, as the world's most populous country observed a nationwide three-minute silence.
Citizens paused, cars, trains and ships sounded their horns, and air-raid sirens … [+4765 chars]
